QuestData.Title: Delivery for Donova
QuestData.Description: Donova Snowden is a kind dwarf who frequents the nearby hot springs. She claims to be studying their magical properties.$B$BShe is a kind person and has good relations with our tribe. As the Winterfall have become more and more aggressive, she has begun researching the cause of their corruption.$B$BI must keep my post here, but I have made a basket of refreshments for her. Please take it to her for me and tell her we await her next visit.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver Salfa's Basket to Donova Snowden in Winterspring.
QuestData.CompletionText: Welcome to the hot springs. What've you got there?
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, how nice of those dear furbolg. I feel so bad for them, cooped up in that hold, afraid of the world.$B$BBut can you blame them? These Winterfall furbolg are turning just as vicious as any in Felwood. I'd like to put a stop to it... if only for the sake of my own research, let alone the dear Timbermaw.
